360 Bd1.1 Vol. 1 (mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti) 1b1-18a5 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa A rya manydzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti The text is incomplete: eg1 (1b1-13a7) corresponds to D360 (1b1-8b3) - eg1 (13a7-13b7) corresponds to D360 (13a6-13b5) eg1 (13b7-14a6) differs from the D360 (13b5-13b7) mang ga laM
279 Bd1.2 Vol. 1 (mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti) 19a1-20a4 dkon mchog rjes dran gyi mdo The text consists of three texts put together: eg2 (14a6-14b8)=D279 (complete text) - eg2 (14b8-15a4)=D280 (complete text) - eg2 (15a4-15a6)=D281 (complete text) - eg2 (15a6-15a7) sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab/ chos kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ dge 'dun yon tan bsam mi khyab/ bsam mi khyab la dad byas pa'i// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ rnam dag zhing du skye bar shog// mang ga laM
668 Bd1.3 Vol. 1 (mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti) 20a5-27a5 A rya a pa ri mi ta A yurdznyA na nA ma ma hA ya su tra 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //'di la 'gyur khyad phran bu yod gi 'dug na'ang/ 'dir rje btsun thams cad mkhyen pa tA rA nA tha'i zhal snga nas/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde la TI ka mdzad pa'i dgongs pa dang mthun pa'o// 'di la brten nas bdag bzhan skye dgu mtha' dag 'chi ba med pa tshe'i dpal la dbang thob par gyur cig/ sarba mang+ga laM/ zhus dag/

119 Bd5.1 Vol. 5 (Wa) Wa 1b1-584a6 + Vol. 6 (Zha) 1b1-457a5 A rya ma hA pa ri nirbA NaM nA ma sU tra 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ste rdzogs so// /rgya'i mkhan po wang pham zhum dang / chos kyi gzhi 'dzin dge ba'i blo gros dang / lo tstsha ba rgya mtsho#i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
175 Bd7.1 Vol. 7 (Za) Za 1b1-150b4 A rya a kSa ya ma ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'bum pa las/ blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe dharma tA shI las zhus/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa
857 Bd7.2 Vol. 7 (Za) 'a 1b1-143a6 A rya da sha bhU mi kA nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 'phags pa sa bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so
49 Bd7.3 Vol. 7 (Za) Ya 1b1-63b7 A rya a mi tA bha byU ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ lnga pa rdzogs so// //bam po gsum pa shlo ka dgu brgya/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang/ dA na shi la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 'dir 'bad dge bas bde ba can/ skyes nas sems can don gyi phyir/ byang chub spyod pa kun spyad nas/ rgyal pa nyid dang mtshungs par shog/ bde can zungs rdzogs so
869 Bd7.4 Vol. 7 (Za) Ra 1b1-2a4 A rya a mi tA bha nA ma ma dhA ra NI 'phags pa snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba gzungs 'phags pa snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba gzungs rdzogs so

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad ma yid bzhin gyi 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin nor bu rdzogs so
